name: @responsive-ui/bottom-bar
description: Create responsive bottom bar components for Svelte.
readme:
# @responsive-ui/bottom-bar > A bottom bar component of responsive-ui.

[![Svelte v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/svelte-v3-orange.svg)](https://svelte.dev) [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@responsive-ui/bottom-bar.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@responsive-ui/bottom-bar) [![Bundle Size](https://badgen.net/bundlephobia/minzip/%40responsive-ui%2Fbottom-bar)](https://bundlephobia.com/result?p=%40responsive-ui%2Fbottom-bar) [![download](https://img.shields.io/npm/dw/@responsive-ui/bottom-bar.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@responsive-ui/bottom-bar) [![LICENCE](https://img.shields.io/github/license/wetix/responsive-ui)](https://github.com/wetix/responsive-ui/blob/main/LICENSE)

## üî® Install ```console npm install @responsive-ui/bottom-bar ``` or ```console yarn add @responsive-ui/bottom-bar ``` ## üîã Sponsors ## üìÑ License [@responsive-ui/bottom-bar](https://github.com/wetix/responsive-ui/tree/main/components/bottom-bar) is 100% free and open-source, under the [MIT license](https://github.com/wetix/responsive-ui/blob/main/LICENSE). ## üéâ Big Thanks To Thanks to these awesome companies for their support of Open Source developers ‚ù§ [![GitHub](https://jstools.dev/img/badges/github.svg)](https://github.com/open-source) [![NPM](https://jstools.dev/img/badges/npm.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/)
